question: 押す
sourceAnswer: to{} push/press | apply-pressure-from-above/press-down | stamp-(i.e.-a-passport)/apply-a-seal | affix-(e.g.-gold-leaf) | press-(someone-for-something)/urge/compel/influence | overwhelm/overpower/repress | push-(events-along)/advance-(a-plan) | do-in-spite-of-.../do-even-though-.../force | make-sure | to-be:pressed-for-time | advance-troops/attack | (of-light)-to-be-diffused-across-an-entire-surface
userAnswer: to{} push/thrust/shove | press/push | stamp/affix | pressure-sb | push-ahead | make-sure ....
activeAnswer: to{} push/thrust/shove | press/push | stamp/affix | pressure-sb | push-ahead | make-sure ....
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>push</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to push</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the one you learned with the kanji, actually!
